outcome: The Cascading Score Collapse: Catastrophic errors in the BCI cause behavior scores to change unpredictably, locking out trusted citizens and empowering once-flagged individuals, triggering widespread panic and power struggles.

events.description: BCI score volatility sweeps the city: trusted doctors and teachers lose all credentials overnight, while previously restricted citizens are given unexpected privileges.
Critical services break down as key workers are unable to access workplaces. Shelters and food programs halt as their directors are flagged 'at risk' by the BCI.
Council emergency sessions expose bitter debates as formerly influential figures find themselves flagged. Efforts at manual score correction prove fruitless.
With the trusted lines of authority gone, neighborhood groups step in to replace city services, openly ignoring the BCI system. Council control over Stenograd slips away.
